name: Nayla
greetingText: Today and Dec 5th are your day!
wishText: May the happiness always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Happy Birthday to one of the strongest people I know. I admire how you keep pushing forward, even when life throws curveballs your way. Today is all about celebrating you—the amazing, resilient, and kind person who inspires everyone around her. Remember, no matter what’s going on, we're here for you in our own way. Wishing you all the love and strength this year has to offer
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
